column2: Question Text
After finishing lunch, the dog chased the mailman down the street. Who finished lunch?
Jogging in the park, the sandwich fell from my backpack. Who was jogging?
While reading a book, the baby cried so loudly that Joann sprinted up the stairs. Who was reading a book?
While painting the fence, a bee stung Sarah on the hand. Who was painting?
Running down the street, the shoes flew off Jacob in a hurry. Who was running?
Wearing a bright helmet, the bicycle raced down the hill faster than Bob imagined. What was wearing a bright helmet?
On her way to the concert, the car broke down suddenly and caused Martha to be late. Who was on her way to the concert?
Flying high in the sky, a tree tangled Max's kite. What was flying high?
Sipping coffee in the morning, the news shocked me. Who was sipping coffee?
While swimming in the pool, the sun made me feel relaxed. What was swimming?
Chasing a basketball, the cat ran into the boy in the middle of the street. Who was chasing the basketball?
While preparing dinner, the children watched cartoons in front of their tired mother. Who was preparing dinner?
Looking out the window, the rain soaked my clothes. Who was looking out the window?
Hiking up the mountain, a rainbow appeared in the sky above Kate's head. Who was hiking up the mountain?
While baking a cake, the dog stole my cookie. Who was baking a cake?
Beeping loudly, my sleepy sister hit the alarm clock's snooze button. What was beeping loudly?
Eating a donut, the house started to shake all around Jim and his dog. Who was eating a donut?
Brushing her hair, the wind blew open the window next to Bethany. Who was brushing her hair?
While washing the dishes, a song played on the Anne's radio. Who was washing the dishes?
Riding his bike, the car honked its horn loudly at Chad. Who was riding his bike?
Walking through the garden, the flowers were as beautiful as a sunset to Robert. Who was walking through the garden?
After painting the fence, a bee stung me on my foot. Who was painting the fence?
Dancing to the music, the book fell off the shelf and hit John's foot. Who was dancing?
Throwing a party, the heat was unbearable for Anne. Who was throwing a party?
While chatting on the phone, the bag fell off the table onto Peter's floor. Who was chatting on the phone?
While planning a trip, the map got wet in the rain even though Vanessa held an umbrella. Who was planning a trip?
After finishing her homework, the dog barked at Abby for a treat. Who finished her homework?
After finishing the race, the ice cream tasted extra delicious to Fred. Who finished the race?
While shopping for groceries, the car broke down even though Zeke had recently taken it to a mechanic. Who was shopping for groceries?
While mowing the lawn, a rabbit ran in front of Eli. What was mowing?
Dancing under the stars, the tree swayed gently and delighted Jenn. Who was dancing?
Walking the dog, the rain started pouring and soaked Robin's shoes. Who was walking the dog?
Discussing the weather, the coffee spilled all over Gabe's coworkers. Who was discussing the weather?
Running late, the train left without me, so I bought another ticket. Who was running late?
Waiting for the bus, her camera captured a sunset that Jane thought was the most beautiful sunset ever. Who was waiting for the bus?
While sitting at a desk, a colorful umbrella passed the window and caught the accountant's attention. Who was sitting at the desk?
Having trouble opening the jar, the father offered to help the child with their problem. Who was having trouble opening the jar?
With papers in hand, a lion attacked the lawyer walking to court. Who had papers in hand?
Picking up the pieces of balloon, the hot sun melted George's skin into puddles of sweat. Who was picking up the pieces?
Carrying the heavy gear, a boulder smashed down the hill in front of the hikers. Who was carrying the heavy gear?
Holding his last health potion, the dragon unleashed a poison-breath attack at the knight. Who was holding a health potion?
Sitting cross-legged, ants swarmed all over Henry's backpack looking for crumbs. Who sat cross-legged?
Shouting as loud as possible, the pandas cowered in fear of the wild monkeys. Who was shouting?
Hopping on one foot, the table fell over and caused Frank to hit his head. Who was hopping on one foot?
Writing carefully in fancy cursive, the letter was Angela's finest piece of penmanship. Who was writing in fancy cursive?
Hoping to get elected for president, the microphone cut out on Vinny in front of the crowd. Who was hoping to get elected for president?
After taking a shower, a muddy puppy ran up to Kelly and jumped up to lick her face. Who had taken the shower?
Thinking about how all his life choices had led to this moment, a bull rushed directly at Jose. Who was thinking about his choices?
With his final college test done, the sun shined extra bright upon the leaves and birds in front of Xavier. Who finished his final college test?
After finishing her homework, Joann celebrated with ice cream. Who finished her homework?
While baking a cake, Sarah enjoyed listening to music. Who was baking a cake?
Walking through the park, Tom spotted a friendly dog. Who was walking through the park?
On her way to school, Maria picked up the mail. Who was on her way to school?
Riding his bike, Jacob felt the wind in his hair. Who was riding his bike?
After enjoying a movie, Jake discussed the plot with friends. Who enjoyed a movie?
Preparing dinner, Lisa arranged the table beautifully. Who was preparing dinner?
While painting a picture, Emily listened to her favorite songs. Who was painting a picture?
Driving to the beach, Gary was excited for the day. Who was driving to the beach?
Sipping coffee in the morning, Anna read the newspaper. Who was sipping coffee?
While training for the marathon, David followed a strict plan. Who was training for the marathon?
After completing the project, the team celebrated their hard work. Who completed the project?
During the meeting, Sam presented his ideas clearly. Who presented his ideas?
Walking the dog, Emily enjoyed the fresh air while talking on her phone. Who was walking the dog?
After a long day at work, my friends and I went out for dinner at a fancy restaurant. Who went out for dinner?
While studying for exams, Mark took breaks when needed. Who was studying for exams?
Trying out new recipes, Sarah invited everyone over for dinner. Who was trying out new recipes?
After cleaning her room, Molly felt accomplished. Who cleaned her room?
While reading a book, Michael found a quiet spot. Who was reading a book?
Finishing the puzzle, Maria felt satisfied to see the landscape emerge. Who finished the puzzle?
Opening up her new laptop for the first time, Jessica's elbow knocked over a vase. Who opened the laptop?
Feeling pride for finishing the job, the wheelbarrow was the last item packed before Jared drove off in his truck. Who was feeling pride?
